name: EpicRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epic music verse
des:
"EPIC RADIO , The Masters of the MusicVerse.
Welcome to the ultimate radio experience! Epic Radio delivers an awesome mix of iconic hits from the '80s, '90s, 2000s... till Today, creating a nonstop journey through the decades.

Step into the Masters of the MusicVerse and discover a revolution in music streaming, crafted for true music lovers who crave variety and epic tunes!

Just say, ""Alexa, play Epic MusicVerse,"" and let the adventure begin!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
